efforts.name: Agent Development Basics
efforts.description: Learn the fundamentals of building and deploying AI agents

projects.name: First Custom Agent
projects.description: Build your first custom agent from scratch

tasks.title: ⭐ Understand agent architecture
tasks.description: Learn how agents work: inputs, processing, outputs. Review example agents to understand patterns and best practices.

tasks.title: Design your agent's purpose
tasks.description: Clearly define what your agent should do. Write a simple specification including inputs, outputs, and expected behavior.

tasks.title: Choose appropriate model
tasks.description: Select the right AI model for your use case. Consider cost, performance, and capabilities of different models.

tasks.title: Implement core functionality
tasks.description: Build the main logic for your agent. Start simple and iterate. Focus on getting basic functionality working first.

tasks.title: Test with sample inputs
tasks.description: Test your agent with various sample inputs. Verify it handles different scenarios and produces expected outputs.

tasks.title: Add error handling
tasks.description: Implement error handling for common failure scenarios. Provide meaningful error messages and graceful degradation.

projects.name: Agent Refinement
projects.description: Improve your agent's reliability and performance

tasks.title: ⭐ Test and refine agent behavior
tasks.description: Test your agent thoroughly with real-world scenarios. Refine prompts, parameters, and logic based on results.

tasks.title: Optimize prompts
tasks.description: Refine your prompts for better results. Test different phrasings, include examples, and iterate based on output quality.

tasks.title: Add input validation
tasks.description: Validate inputs before processing. Check for required fields, data types, and format constraints.

tasks.title: Implement output formatting
tasks.description: Ensure agent outputs are properly formatted. Parse and structure responses for easy consumption by downstream systems.

tasks.title: Add logging and debugging
tasks.description: Implement logging to track agent execution. Log inputs, outputs, and intermediate steps for debugging.

tasks.title: Document agent behavior
tasks.description: Document how your agent works, what inputs it expects, and what outputs it produces. Include examples and edge cases.

efforts.name: Advanced Agent Patterns
efforts.description: Learn advanced patterns for building sophisticated agents

projects.name: Multi-Step Agents
projects.description: Build agents that perform complex multi-step workflows

tasks.title: ⭐ Design workflow architecture
tasks.description: Plan a multi-step workflow. Break down complex tasks into discrete steps with clear inputs and outputs.

tasks.title: Implement step orchestration
tasks.description: Build logic to orchestrate multiple steps. Handle step sequencing, conditional branching, and error recovery.

tasks.title: Add state management
tasks.description: Manage state across workflow steps. Store intermediate results and context needed for subsequent steps.

tasks.title: Handle step failures
tasks.description: Implement retry logic and error recovery. Allow workflows to continue or gracefully fail when steps encounter errors.

tasks.title: Add progress tracking
tasks.description: Track progress through multi-step workflows. Provide status updates and enable resuming interrupted workflows.

tasks.title: Test workflow end-to-end
tasks.description: Test complete workflows with various scenarios. Verify all steps execute correctly and handle edge cases.

projects.name: Agent Composition
projects.description: Combine multiple agents to solve complex problems

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify agent composition opportunities
tasks.description: Find scenarios where multiple agents working together can solve problems better than a single agent.

tasks.title: Design agent communication
tasks.description: Plan how agents will communicate and share data. Define interfaces and data formats for agent interactions.

tasks.title: Implement agent chaining
tasks.description: Chain agents together where one agent's output becomes another's input. Handle data transformation between agents.

tasks.title: Add parallel agent execution
tasks.description: Run multiple agents in parallel when appropriate. Aggregate results and handle partial failures.

tasks.title: Create agent coordination logic
tasks.description: Build logic to coordinate multiple agents. Decide when to use which agent and how to combine their outputs.

tasks.title: Test agent compositions
tasks.description: Test various agent compositions. Verify they work together correctly and produce desired outcomes.

projects.name: Agent Optimization
projects.description: Optimize agents for performance, cost, and quality

tasks.title: ⭐ Profile agent performance
tasks.description: Measure agent performance: response time, token usage, and cost. Identify optimization opportunities.

tasks.title: Optimize prompt length
tasks.description: Reduce prompt size where possible. Remove unnecessary context while maintaining quality. Use efficient prompt structures.

tasks.title: Implement caching
tasks.description: Cache common queries and responses. Reduce API calls and improve response times for repeated requests.

tasks.title: Fine-tune model selection
tasks.description: Choose the most cost-effective model for each task. Use smaller models when appropriate, larger models only when needed.

tasks.title: Add streaming responses
tasks.description: Implement streaming for long-running agents. Provide incremental updates and improve perceived performance.

tasks.title: Monitor and iterate
tasks.description: Continuously monitor agent performance and costs. Iterate on optimizations based on real-world usage data.

tasks.title: ⭐ Create test suite
tasks.description: Build comprehensive test suite covering happy paths, edge cases, and error scenarios. Include unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.

tasks.title: Test with production-like data
tasks.description: Test agents with realistic data that mirrors production. Ensure they handle real-world complexity and edge cases.

tasks.title: Validate output quality
tasks.description: Establish quality metrics and validate agent outputs meet standards. Review outputs for accuracy, completeness, and format.

tasks.title: Test error scenarios
tasks.description: Test how agents handle errors: API failures, invalid inputs, timeouts, and unexpected responses.

tasks.title: Load test agents
tasks.description: Test agent performance under load. Verify they can handle expected traffic and scale appropriately.

tasks.title: Security testing
tasks.description: Test for security vulnerabilities. Check input validation, output sanitization, and access controls.

tasks.title: ⭐ Create deployment checklist
tasks.description: Document deployment steps and pre-deployment checks. Include configuration, testing, and rollback procedures.

tasks.title: Set up staging environment
tasks.description: Create staging environment matching production. Test deployments in staging before production release.

tasks.title: Configure production settings
tasks.description: Set production configurations: API keys, rate limits, timeouts, and resource allocations.

tasks.title: Set up monitoring
tasks.description: Configure monitoring for agent performance, errors, and usage. Set up alerts for critical issues.

tasks.title: Create runbooks
tasks.description: Document operational procedures: deployments, rollbacks, troubleshooting, and incident response.

tasks.title: Plan rollback strategy
tasks.description: Define rollback procedures if deployment fails. Test rollback process to ensure it works smoothly.
